name: Gnomus Maximus
description:
Originally a gift for a Secret Santa game compilation, Gnomus Maximus is a challenging retro-styled platformer appropriate for all ages, with plenty of ways to play and enjoy!

  • smooth-as-silk platforming action
  • classic features: springboards, spike hazards, conveyor belts, destruction timer, and more
  • strange creatures to avoid or freeze with your special gnome dust
  • exclusive content and secret features for those who beat all the game modes
  • multiple game modes: classic, sunrise, jump adventure, gift-giving
  • light-hearted fun!

Gnomus Maximus is free to download and play, but if you liked it, please contribute! I learned a tremendous amount while completing this project, and want to continue to make enjoyable, easy-to-learn, and engaging games. Your donations will serve as an inspiration to me, and motivation to continue (not to mention, obvious financial support!).

Thanks!
